overview: In the name of team spirit Samantha Ryan seduces cheerleader Bree Daniels igniting uncontrollable passion. At the hotel the cheerleaders and their chaperones have their own way of loosening up after the competition. Hayden Hawkens and Hayden Winters are the only girls on the squad without boyfriends and become closer in more ways than one. By day they cheer the home team...By night they live their fantasies.
tagline: Just Looking For Something To Cheer About
title: Cheer Squad Sleepovers
